reviewsJson.markdown:
**RTA/ Goblin Mini**

**% Used/ 5**

**Coil/ Dual W/ 35** 

**Steep Time/1 week Wicking/ Full**

**PG/VG 50/50 Nic% 0**

**Mouth Feel** - No discernable throat hit. Smooth through the nose, throat and lungs.

**Flavor Properties**- Creamy, milky, vanilla, cinnamon-ish, rice pudding

**Relatable Flavors** - This is just like drinking real life horchata. For those who don't know, horchata is a cinnamon-vanilla rice milk drink. At 5%, I get fairly mild notes of spices, milk and a touch of vanilla.

**Off Flavors** - Nothing particularly off about it. No chemical aftertaste or smell. 

**Position In The Recipe** - This will work as a delicious base note. I could see people using this at about 5 or 6%, then using fruits, vanilla, creams and other spices to help bring out that realistic horchata taste. 

**Pairings** - Vanilla, cream, nutmeg, custard, fruits, pumpkin, coffee, the sky's the limit!

**End notes** - This is a really good flavor. It's relatively sweet, creamy, milky and is the foundation of a good horchata flavor. As a standalone, I would vape it at 8% (trust me, it's really good!). As an accent, I would start around 3 - 4%.
reviewsJson.author: thedirtyprojector
reviewsJson.title: Horchata
